title: Matterbridge AEG RX9 / Electrolux Pure i9 Robot Vacuum

apiKey.description: API Key obtained from the Electrolux Group Developer Portal Dashboard.

accessToken.description: Authorization Access Token obtained from the Electrolux Group Developer Portal Dashboard.

accessTokenURL.description: An endpoint that can provide an Access Token (used for development/testing).

refreshToken.description: Authorization Refresh Token obtained from the Electrolux Group Developer Portal Dashboard.

pollIntervalSeconds.description: How often each robot vacuum is polled for status. The recommended value depends on the number of devices being polled, e.g. 30s for a single robot vacuum, increasing to 60s for two, 90s for three, etc.

whiteList.description: Only expose robot vacuum devices listed here, identified by their serial number. Leave empty to expose all devices.

blackList.description: Exclude any robot vacuum devices listed here, identified by their serial number. Leave empty to expose all devices.

debug.description: Capture debug-level logging from this plugin, overriding the Matterbridge global log level setting.

debugFeatures.description: Advanced diagnostics: Enable only for troubleshooting or development.

unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all exposed devices on shutdown (used for development/testing).
